name: BRAIN IT OUT
description:
so, brain it out is an all platform game which Is made on construct 2.

this is a brainstorming game that is developed for

increasing the ability of quick response. it a racing game, here, we have to

find the answers to the questions on the map while racing as fast as possible

it has 2 subjects, math, and science. math problems are generated randomly but science

problems are the same. in the last, u have to fight with the boss. the boss asks you three questions, and u have to answer them.

follow us on itch for receiving all updates!! 

https://studiousgamer.itch.io/
